content.question: Each of the following is a requirement for submissions to the competition EXCEPT:

choices.label: A submitted photo must have been taken by the entrant using a mobile phone.
A submitted photo must be accompanied by a text of approximately 100 characters.
Submitted content must show both natural scenery and local residents.
Submitted content must show the entrantâ€™s own experience or local customs in the area visited.

content.answer: Submitted content must show both natural scenery and local residents.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
